attributes.action: The national provision of dog facilities.
attributes.additional_details:
Dog walking off leed areas are pooly signed and are dificult to access. I prepose that national standardised signage of dog frienly areas should be portrayed in a positive way.
The provision of dog waste bins is in too many colours making it dificult to identify at distance. I prepose natioally one colour bis are supplied and situated next to a public litter bin.
